metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10243 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: htp_parse_authorization_digest in htp_parsers.c in LibHTP 0.5.26 allows remote attackers to cause a heap-based buffer over-read via an authorization digest header.

criterions.comment: htp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
libhtp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
suricata: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
